Question: The ____ Regents Chair in Communication seats the Texas College of Communications dean.
Hints: In 1985, this person was honoured with the induction into the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences Hall of Fame.
In late 2005 this person began dating opera singer Joanna Simon, Carly Simon's older sister.
The National Aeronautics and Space Administration honoured this person on February 28, 2006.
